channel.title: Looking for dedicated and good coders! Recreating Old RS2!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]RS2 Recreating!!![/size]
Hey guys. I need very dedicated and good coders to do this. I need you guys to help me to recreate old RS2 (Like last summer?) 100% or close to that :D Like, all npcs (almost), all items (almost) 100% wilderness (100%!), all the ladders etc working, prayer recharing at altars, prayers working and etc... Like I said this is not going to be a little project, it is goign to be very hard, time consuming and boring project. But it is very rewarding, if we get it working good. If you want to apply, please fill this:
Moparname: Previous experience: Age: Job you want: Other information:
Here are some jobs:
Testers: whosdr
Coders: whosdr
Can't figure any else now, post here if you have any ideas for that...
POST HERE TO APPLY YOURSELF INTO THE TEAM

item.title: Looking for dedicated and good coders! Recreating Old RS2!
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Moparname: me
Previous experience: I made moparscape
Age: 235616516
Job you want: God
Other information: im 1337

READ THE RULES, this isnt going to be a serious development therefore it will get locked, i jsut cant wait fr it to crash and burn like the other 4 billiopn dev teams. GIVE UP NOW WHILE YOU HAVE THE CHANCE.

Read full topic
